title: Add real-time data roaming to allow Apple Continuity-like scenarios
body: I know that there is RoamingData and there even is this "HighPriority" entry that you can use for "quickly" roaming app data. However, even the HighPriority data typically takes at least one minute to roam to other devices. This is way too slow, data needs to arrive within few seconds. With Apple fronting Continuity, we need a simple way to do the same on the Windows platform to be able to compete!
